EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - Atlanta 10-26-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Atlanta. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—Atlanta, GA Thursday, October 27, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast
9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/atlanta]]>
Location: TWELVE Atlantic Station <[[http://twelvehotels.com/luxury-suites-twelve-hotels-atlantic-station/]]> 361 17th Street NW Atlanta, Georgia 30363 Room: Twelve Hotels Ballroom Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/361+17th+St+NW,+Atlanta,+GA+30363/@33.7915932,-84.4002794,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88f504f9d01f642f:0xdae5b99f4995c09f!8m2!3d33.7915888!4d-84.3980907]]>
Parking information: Discount Valet Parking $10 for daily drive-in Questions? Contact Jamie De Martini at jdemartini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdemartini@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
